title: 22(2), 343(4)(a), 430(3), 436(1) and 441(2)(b) of the Companies Act 2014 (No.
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Companies Act 2014 (Forms)
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Companies Act 2014 (Forms) 

Regulations 2020. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on 16 December 2020.

heading: 7. The Companies Act 2014 (Forms) Regulations 2018 (S.I. No. 95 of
text_raw:
7. The Companies Act 2014 (Forms) Regulations 2018 (S.I. No. 95 of

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 25th December, 2020.

title: 22(2), 343(4)(a), 430(3), 436(1) and 441(2)(b) of the Companies Act 2014 (No.
heading: (This Note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This Note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

The purpose of these Regulations is to prescribe amended forms for the 
purposes of sections 22(2), 343(4)(a), 430(3), 436(1) and 441(2)(b) of the 
Companies Act 2014. The Regulations also revoke the Companies Act 2014 
(Forms) Regulations 2018 (S.I. No. 95 of 2018).
